name: What's Wrong with Jasper?
description:
-Story-

After your lost dog Jasper returns home, you realize that something's wrong with him. You must venture out and help your animal friends find what they've lost to collect the rune stones for Mr. Turtle. Returning Mr. Turtle's rune stones is the only way to find a cure for Jasper.

-Animal Friends-

Miss Squirrel (In a tree)

Mr. Crow

Mrs. Chicken

Mr. Turtle

-Controls-

Movement: WASD

Run: Left Shift

Interact: Left Mouse

Drop Items: Right Mouse

-Info-

This game is a submission for the Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #2. The theme was "Lost and Found". It's a totally different style from anything we've made, but it was a lot of fun and we're proud of it. :)

-Credits-

Sounds used:

Music: https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/325647/

Book Pages Variations: https://freesound.org/people/Piggimon/sounds/366220/

Digging .wav: https://freesound.org/people/tanapistorius/sounds/367010/

Cute Animal Whining Vocalization: https://freesound.org/people/Mountain852/sounds/365823/

Dog whining sound: https://freesound.org/people/Piink_Aces/sounds/257824/

single dog barking medium sized dog sound effect: https://freesound.org/people/Garuda1982/sounds/554599/
